name: Dark Adventure
overview: Dark Adventure is 2D top-down arcade action game, similar to Gauntlet. The player can "choose" (by changing the position at the machine) one from 3 characters: Labryna (first), Condor (second), and Zorlock (third, absent in European/Japanese version), each with different weapon. Dr. Condor, archaeologist, accidentally opened the boxes with the demon, who transported him, reporter Labryna and fellow archaeologist Zorlock into another world. Now, they must defeat Demon King. They fight against enemies (like minotaurs, rats and giant spiders) search keys and unlock exits to another arenas. There are a total of 40 areas to explore. Game uses 3 buttons (for jumping, attacking and dynamite). Dark Adventure has co-op multiplayer up to 3 players (2 in European/Japan versions)
